ticket.headerDesc: We would like to Introduce our Observation Deck.
ticket.ticketCounterDesc: You can buy entrance ticket at B1 ticket counter.
ticket.discount:
• From 9:00 to 10:00 Discount 50%.
  • From 22:00 to 23:00 Discount 50%.
  • Family package (Min 2 adults & Max 5 kids) Get 50% off for kid only.
ticket.note:
• The domestic discount applies to Vietnamese citizen only.
  • 3 Years Children or under age are free.
  • All ticket fares are included VAT(10%)
  • Purchasing the tickets at Ticket Counter located in B1 floor.

Observation deck on the day until 23:00

about.text1: Lotte Center Hanoi will become a new landmark in Hanoi. It will bring a high-quality lifestyle, aiming at impressing not only Vietnam, but the whole world as well. Lotte Observation Deck is located on the 65th floor of Lotte Center Hanoi as the third tallest building in Vietnam.
about.text2: Standing at a thrilling height of 272 meters in the air, you can relax your body and immerse yourself in the feeling of pleasant and surprise to enjoy the panoramic view 360 degree Hanoi just in the blink of an eye.
about.text3: Visitors can sip coffee, shop for souvenirs and admire every aspect of Hanoi's landscapes.

contact.headerDesc: Please feel free to leave a message. We will response as soon as possible
contact.success: Thank you for contacting us. One of our representatives will be in contact with you shortly regarding your inquiry. If you ever have any questions that require immediate assistance, please call us at +84-4-3333-6000. Have a great day!
